item.title: Front Page Contact Form
item.dc:creator: phytrehab
item.content:encoded:
[submit "Send Message"]
1 Phyt Website Contact Form info@phytrehab.com mike@mzoo.org [your-name] [phone-number] [street-address] [your-message] Reply-to: "[your-name]" <[email]> 1 Thank you from Phyt Rehab! "Phyt Rehab" "[your-name]" <[email]> Thank you for reaching out to Phyt Rehab! We will follow up as soon as possible. If urgent please call our toll-free number here: 1.888.575.3483 Sincerely, Your Friends at Phyt Rehab 171 Kings Highway Brooklyn, NY 11223 Toll Free: 1.888.575.3483 phytrehab.com Reply-To: noreply@phytrehab.com Your message was sent successfully. Thanks. Failed to send your message. Please try later or contact the administrator by another method. Validation errors occurred. Please confirm the fields and submit it again. Failed to send your message. Please try later or contact the administrator by another method. Please accept the terms to proceed. Please fill in the required field. This input is too long. This input is too short. Date format seems invalid. This date is too early. This date is too late. Failed to upload file. This file type is not allowed. This file is too large. Failed to upload file. Error occurred. Number format seems invalid. This number is too small. This number is too large. Your answer is not correct. Your entered code is incorrect. Email address seems invalid. URL seems invalid. Telephone number seems invalid.

item.title: Get in Touch
item.dc:creator: phytrehab
item.content:encoded:
[text* your-name placeholder"NAME *"]

[email* your-email placeholder"EMAIL *"]

[text your-phone placeholder"PHONE NUMBER"]

[select menu-102 placeholder"SELECT DEPARTMENT" "RECRUITMENT" "BUSINESS INQUIRIES" "HUMAN RESOURCES" "GENERAL INQUIRIES"]

[textarea your-message placeholder"HOW CAN WE HELP?"]

[submit "SEND MESSAGE"]

1 Phyt Rehab Inquiry - [menu-102] "Phyt Rehab Website" mike@mzoo.org Main message: [your-message] Reply-To: pantamine@gmail.com 1 Thank you from Phyt Rehab! "Phyt Rehab" [your-email] Thank you for reaching out to Phyt Rehab! We will follow up as soon as possible. If urgent please call our toll-free number here: 1.888.575.3483 Sincerely, Your Friends at Phyt Rehab 171 Kings Highway Brooklyn, NY 11223 Toll Free: 1.888.575.3483 phytrehab.com Reply-To: daisy@phytrehab.com Your message was sent successfully. Thanks. Failed to send your message. Please try later or contact the administrator by another method. Validation errors occurred. Please confirm the fields and submit it again. Error occurred. Number format seems invalid. This number is too small. This number is too large. Your answer is not correct. Your entered code is incorrect. Email address seems invalid. URL seems invalid. Telephone number seems invalid.

item.title: Job Application
item.dc:creator: mikekilmer
item.content:encoded:
<label> Full Name (required) [text* full-name] </label>
<label> Address (street) [text address-street] </label>
<label> City, State [cityfieldtext city-state-zip]</label>
<label> Email (required) [email* email] </label>
<label> Phone Number (required) [tel* phone-number] </label>
<label> Cover Letter [textarea cover-letter] </label>
Optionally attach your resume (format: pdf, rtf, word doc, txt) [file Resume limit:5000000 filetypes:docx|pdf|word|doc|rtf|txt]
[submit "Send"] 1 Phyt Rehab Job Application [full-name] <info@phytrehab.com> mike@mzoo.org [full-name] [phone-number] [email] [address-street] [city-state-zip]
[cover-letter]
-- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on Phyt Rehab (http://phytrehab.com) Reply-To: [email] [Resume]
1 Phyt Rehab Job Inquiry Received Phyt Rehab <info@phytrehab.com> [your-name] <[email]> Hi friend.
Thanks for the interest in being a fellow healer and part of the #PhytSquad.
We received your email and will be back in touch with you as soon as possible.
You are always welcome to drop us a line as well.
Sincerely,
Your Friends at Phyt Rehab.
171 Kings Highway Brooklyn, NY 11223 Toll Free: 1.888.575.3483 phytrehab.com
-- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on Phyt Rehab (http://staging.phytrehab.com) Reply-To: no-reply@phytrehab.com [Resume]
Thank you for your message. It has been sent. There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later. One or more fields have an error. Please check and try again. There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later. You must accept the terms and conditions before sending your message. The field is required. The field is too long. The field is too short. The date format is incorrect. The date is before the earliest one allowed. The date is after the latest one allowed. There was an unknown error uploading the file. You are not allowed to upload files of this type. The file is too big. There was an error uploading the file. The number format is invalid. The number is smaller than the minimum allowed. The number is larger than the maximum allowed. The answer to the quiz is incorrect. Your entered code is incorrect. The e-mail address entered is invalid. The URL is invalid. The telephone number is invalid.
